text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Ben Ali on Friday chaired a cabinet meeting devoted to the government's policy in the transport sector during the next five years.
- The Italian Senate has ratified the Tunisia-EU accord signed in 1995 for the establishment of a free trade zone, the Italian embassy in Tunis says.
- Justice ministry prepares a code of international private law.
- The press group Assabah-Le temps celebrates its 46th anniversary.
- Tunisia, Libya agree to cooperate in the parmaceutical sector.
